{{Use mdy dates|date=November 2015}}
[[Netflix]] is an on-demand internet [[streaming media]] provider.  It has distributed a number of Netflix-exclusive programs, including original series such as ''[[House of Cards (U.S. TV series)|House of Cards]]'' and ''[[Orange Is the New Black]]'', among specials, miniseries, and films such as ''[[The Square (2013 film)|The Square]]'' (2013), which was nominated for an [[Academy Award]], the first nomination for a Netflix production. ''[[Lilyhammer]]'' is the first television show to be streamed on Netflix; it premiered on February 6, 2012.

In addition to its original productions, Netflix's exclusive programming contains continuations of previously canceled series from other channels, including ''[[Arrested Development (TV series)|Arrested Development]]'', ''[[The Killing (U.S. TV series)|The Killing]]'', ''[[Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008 TV series)|Star Wars: The Clone Wars]]'', ''[[Trailer Park Boys]]'', and ''[[Longmire (TV series)|Longmire]]''. Netflix previously produced content through [[Red Envelope Entertainment]].

==Current original programming==
These shows had their original production commissioned by Netflix, or had additional seasons commissioned by Netflix.
